ygData.subject: RE: All time high?
ygData.msgSnippet: Level 42 Barbarian Warrior.  My max slash (with strength buffed to 168) is about 94.  I use an Executioners axe.  Same fight I max critical for about 171.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Level 42 Barbarian Warrior. My max slash (with strength buffed to 168) is
about 94. I use an Executioners axe. Same fight I max critical for about
171. I assume that the actually highest I could attain when buffed like
that would be around 184. Double my max slash.

I have been seeing people my level using one handed slashing weapons getting
many critical hits in the upper 40s and 50s. I have even see some 60s.

Daks
Quellious

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin Neal [mailto:kevin@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 3:00 PM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: [warriors_eq] All time high?

From: Kevin Neal <kevin@...>

I'm new to the list, and I'm not sure if this has been asked
before...but....what is your all time high crit and non-crit hit? Include
your race/lvl/and weapon you used with it...


Tykken

For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
